title: Faculty & Staff
description: Meet our distinguished faculty and staff members.

faculty.name: Dr. Jane Smith
faculty.bio: Dr. Smith researches advanced propulsion systems and mentors student rocketry projects.
publications: Smith et al., 2022 — Hybrid Propulsion Advances

faculty.name: Dr. John Doe
faculty.bio: Focuses on robotics and automation with applied industry collaborations.

faculty.name: Dr. Emily Chen
faculty.bio: Researches advanced composites for lightweight structures.

faculty.name: Dr. Michael Lee
faculty.bio: Teaches systems modeling and supports capstone teams.

faculty.name: Dr. Sarah Patel
faculty.bio: Leads advising and student success initiatives across the college.

faculty.name: David Ortiz
faculty.bio: Oversees lab operations, safety, and student training.

faculty.name: Laura Nguyen
faculty.bio: Coordinates events, outreach, and departmental communications.

faculty.name: Dr. Kevin Brown
faculty.bio: Works on autonomous systems and sensor fusion.
publications: Brown et al., 2022 — Sensor Fusion Techniques

faculty.name: Dr. Aisha Rahman
faculty.bio: Studies sustainable materials and green infrastructure.
faculty.degree: Ph.D., Civil & Environmental Engineering, UC Berkeley

faculty.name: Marcus Wright
faculty.bio: Supports fabrication labs and student maker projects.
faculty.degree: A.A.S., Industrial Technology, Local Community College
